name: test_get_proxied_endpoints_action
description:
arrange: Deploy the charm integrated with any_charm haproxy-route.
    act: Trigger the action 'get-proxied-endpoints.
    assert: The correct proxied endpoints are returned.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: Deploy the charm integrated with any_charm haproxy-route.
act: Trigger the action 'get-proxied-endpoints.
assert: The correct proxied endpoints are returned.
